# replace(menu:with:)

**Instance Method**

Replace an identified menu with a menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func replace(menu replacedIdentifier: UIMenu.Identifier, with replacementMenu: UIMenu)
```

## Parameters

- **replacedIdentifier**: The identifier of the menu to be replaced.
title: replace(menu:with:)
